comments:
build I20040316-1300

Using the releng plugin 3.0.3, I tried to do a release on org.eclipse.ui.ide.
Later, I noticed this in the console.

org.eclipse.releng.tools.TagAndReleaseOperation$1)

While not technicaly a duplicate, bug 53689 has a patch which is a rework of 
the release tool. The reasl cause of this problem though is that the releng 
tool is not part of the build but relies on non-API that occasionally changes. 
I will open a bug report for this issue.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 53689 ***
